remarks: The value of a structure component extractor is the value of the corresponding slot of the structure.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Mar-2020.)
statement:
strndxid.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
strndxid.e $e |- E = Slot N $.
strndxid.n $e |- N e. NN $.
strndxid $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` ( E ` ndx ) ) = ( E ` S ) ) $.
